result.markdown:
**Project Cost of Capital with Comparable Firm** Aurora Technologies is evaluating a new project. The closest comparable firm (all-equity financed) has an equity beta of 1.14. The risk-free rate is 2.5% and the expected market risk premium is 6.5%. ::: {.question-block}
✅ Cost of capital = rf + β × (Market premium) = **9.93**%.
:::
